title: serviceSiteInformation
description: Information about the site where service is requested.

objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceSiteInformation.

siteName.description: A name by which the service site is known.
siteName.title: Site Name

siteDescription.description: A description for the service site.
siteDescription.title: Site Description

siteCompanyName.description: The name of the company that is located at the Service location. This may be different from the name of the Customer that ordered services at that Service Site.
siteCompanyName.title: Site Company Name

customerName.description: The name of the end (retail) customer for the UNI.
customerName.title: Customer Name

siteAddress.description: A property address for the site. Either a Site Address, a Site Code or a Site Geographic Point must be specified.
siteAddress.title: Site Address

additionalSiteInformation.description: Additional information about the Site. Equates to the ASR AAI field.
additionalSiteInformation.title: Additional Site Information
